name: Espir
description:
Espir is a tower jumper platformer, in which as a little robot, you are trying to reach the very top of the tower. Rocketjumps and teleports will help you climb faster, but you have to avoid evil robots and waterfalls which will push you down. 

It was developed as our first game project, in Futuregames. 

Made by:

Tytus Czyżewski - Level design, Sound design UI design, Product Owner 

David Mohlén -  Level design, Sound design UI design, Visual Design

Alen Forko - Technical Programmer, UI programmer

Tor Nordmark, Input Programmer

Amanda Hahne - Artist, UI artist, environment artist, props Artist, 3D modeling

Zara Phan - character designer, 2D artist

André Stålarw - Quality Assurance, Trailer Creator

Linus Henriksson - Quality Assurance

Music used in a game was made by Karl Casey @ White Bat Audio
